// <auto-generated/>
using System;
using System.Buffers;
using System.Buffers.Binary;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using System.Text;
using FourSer.Contracts;
using System.IO;
using FourSer.Gen.Helpers;
using SpanReader = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.RoSpanReaderHelpers;
using StreamReader = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamReaderHelpers;
using SpanWriter = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers;
using StreamWriter = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamWriterHelpers;

namespace FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.IgnoredMembers;

public partial class IgnoredMembersPacket : ISerializable<IgnoredMembersPacket>
{
    public static int GetPacketSize(IgnoredMembersPacket obj)
    {
        if (obj is null) return 0;
        var size = 0;
        size += sizeof(byte); // Size for unmanaged type Included
        return size;
    }

    private IgnoredMembersPacket(byte included)
    {
        this.Included = included;
    }

    public IgnoredMembersPacket()
    {
        this.Included = default;
    }

    public static IgnoredMembersPacket Deserialize(ref System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        var included = SpanReader.ReadByte(ref buffer);
        var obj = new IgnoredMembersPacket(included);
        return obj;
    }

    public static IgnoredMembersPacket Deserialize(System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        return Deserialize(ref buffer);
    }

    public static IgnoredMembersPacket Deserialize(System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        var included = StreamReader.ReadByte(stream);
        var obj = new IgnoredMembersPacket(included);
        return obj;
    }

    public static void Serialize(IgnoredMembersPacket obj, ref System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        if (obj is null) return;
        SpanWriter.WriteByte(ref data, (byte)(obj.Included));
    }

    public static void Serialize(IgnoredMembersPacket obj, System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        Serialize(obj, ref data);
    }

    public static void Serialize(IgnoredMembersPacket obj, System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        if (obj is null) return;
        StreamWriter.WriteByte(stream, (byte)(obj.Included));
    }
}
